# Do some QC
```{r}
# filter some samples or taxa

subsettedData_AAE <- amp_subset_samples(AalborgWWTPs,
                                    Plant %in% c("Aalborg East"),
                                    normalise = TRUE
                                    )


```

# Alpha-diversity check, octave plots
```{r}
ds <- amp_subset_samples(AalborgWWTPs, Year %in% 2014)

amp_octave(ds,
  group_by = "SampleID",
  tax_aggregate = "Genus",
  scales = "free_y",
  num_threads = 1
)
```
